text: The baby formula shortage is reaching crisis levels & we need the FDA to step up & address this issue. With a 4month old at home, I know the impact it's having on families nationwide. At a time of such division, I hope we can come to an agreement on a solution for BABY FORMULA.

The polarization of our discourse & the spreading of hate & conspiracies online has created a dangerous breeding ground for extremists.

What we witnessed in Buffalo last night was horrific; it was pure evil. My heart is with the victims, their families, & the community.

I'm proud to know Dr. Attar, a Chicago MD who has risked his life to help those in dire need. From #Syria to #Ukraine, he's volunteered in their hospitals & witnessed the devastation & horror. In both places, innocent people are targeted by Putin with impunity. Enough is enough. https://t.co/wuM6R9w7W6

Another heinous look at the true intentions of Russia’s war on Ukraine. This war crime and the countless others they’ve committed cannot go unchecked. Putin must be held accountable for these atrocities. https://t.co/WiOUYSYPmh
